survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate Mindfulness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees on their satisfaction and experiences with corporate mindfulness programs, including perceived benefits and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate mindfulness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge participation frequency. Ensure options cover the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate mindfulness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which types of mindfulness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify popular programs. Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which types of mindfulness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate mindfulness programs offered by your employer?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate mindfulness programs offered by your employer?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the corporate mindfulness programs?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses where possible.
